content.question: The harmonic structure of the main section is

choices.label: Roman numerals one, one (repeated). Five, one (repeated).
Roman numerals one, five (repeated). One, five (repeated).
Roman numerals one, five (repeated). Five, one (repeated).
Roman numerals one, four (repeated). Five, one (repeated).

content.answer: Roman numerals one, five (repeated). Five, one (repeated).

topic.text: 4.3: Harmonic Progression, Functional Harmony, and Cadences

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Use symbols and terms to describe melodic, harmonic, and rhythmic relationships in performed music. (This skill is applied in describing these elements in a full musical context.)
